usecase.name: Create New Teamspace
usecase.scenario: A user creates a teamspace and invites other members by mentioning their emails. Those who accept the invitations become members of the teamspace.
usecase.preconditions: User is logged in to Notion and has at least one workspace in Notion.
steps: User provides name of the new Teamspace
User provides icon of the new Teamspace
User provides emails of other invited members

testcases.name: Valid Teamspace Creation
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully create a teamspace when he provides valid information.

testcases.name: Empty Teamspace Name
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where a user provides empty teamspace name.

testcases.name: Invalid Icon Type
testcases.description: Verify that the system rejects unsupported file types for the teamspace icon.

testcases.name: Too Many Invited Emails
testcases.description: Verify that the system prevents a user under Free plan from inviting more than 10 guests in a single teamspace creation.

testcases.name: Invalid Email Format
testcases.description: Verify that the system detects and rejects invalid email formats.

testcases.name: Invitaion to an Email without Notion
testcases.description: Verify that the system detects when the given email address has no associated Notion account.

usecase.name: Manage Teamspace Permissions
usecase.scenario: A teamspace owner may change the permission levels of any other owner or member.A member may only change the permission levels of other members.
usecase.preconditions: The teamspace is created and members have joined successfully.
steps: Teamspace owner changes the permission level of other members to one of 'Full Access', 'Ã‡an View', 'Can Edit' or 'Can Comment'
Alternatively, Teamspace owner upgrades another member to owner.
Alternatively, Teamspace owner downgrades another owner to member.

testcases.name: Consistent Permissions
testcases.description: Verify that consistent teamspace permissions can be set properly.

testcases.name: Invalid Permission Level
testcases.description: Verify that the permission level falls under one of the 4 categories.

testcases.name: Permission Level Update by Member
testcases.description: Verify that a general member cannot alter the permission levels of all members.

testcases.name: Downgrade of Owner by Member
testcases.description: Verify that a general member cannot downgrade a owner to a general member.

usecase.name: Share Page with Individuals
usecase.scenario: A user shares his page with other members or groups while specifying the access levels of each.
usecase.preconditions: The user is logged in and the page is created.
steps: User selects a page from his workspace.
User selects names of members or groups to share with.
User sets permission levels of each of the members or groups.

testcases.name: Valid Sharing
testcases.description: Verify that the page is shared properly when invites members and groups are valid.

testcases.name: Sharing with only Members
testcases.description: Verify that the page sharing is successful when only members are added and no groups are added.

testcases.name: Sharing with only Groups
testcases.description: Verify that the page sharing is successful when only groups are added and no individual members are added.

testcases.name: Empty Sharing Specification
testcases.description: Verify that the page sharing is rejected when no members or groups are selected.

testcases.name: Invalid Permission Category
testcases.description: Verify that the page sharing is rejected when the chosen permission category does not fall under the allowed 4 types of permissions.

usecase.name: Publish Page as Website
usecase.scenario: A user publishes a page as a website that if publicly available. The user selects domain name, SEO and link settings based on his subscription plan.
usecase.preconditions: The user is logged in and the page is created.
steps: User opens a page from his workspace.
User proceeds to publish as Website option.
User approves the proposed randomly generated website domain.
Alternatively, the user may choose his own domain if he is in a PLus subscription
The user chooses SEO and LInk Expiration related preferences and finalizes publishing.

testcases.name: Valid Publishing
testcases.description: Verify that the website is created properly when the user follows a valid process.

testcases.name: Choosing Custom Domain in Free Plan
testcases.description: Verify that the cannot choose a custom domain when he is in a Free plan.

testcases.name: Choosing Custom Domain in Plus Plan
testcases.description: Verify that the can choose a custom domain when he is in a Plus subscription plan.

testcases.name: Specifying Link Expiry Period in Free Plan
testcases.description: Verify that the cannot specify a link expiry period when he is in a Free plan.

usecase.name: Collaborate in real-time
usecase.scenario: One or more than one user collaborates on a page content in real-time. The system approves or rejects the edits based on consistency.
usecase.preconditions: The page is shared with the user(s).
steps: User opens tha shared page.
User selects a particular block of the page.
User edits the content of the selected block.

testcases.name: Valid Editing
testcases.description: Verify that the editing is successful when all editors have enough privilege and they are not simultaneously modifying the same block.

testcases.name: Insufficient Permission
testcases.description: Verify that the editing is discarded when some editor has insufficient access privilege.

testcases.name: Simultaneous Editing
testcases.description: Verify that the editing is discarded when more than one editor are trying to simultaneously modify the same block.

usecase.name: Add comments to Page Content
usecase.scenario: On the comment portion of a page block, user writes a text and/or mentions another persons/guests/pages.
usecase.preconditions: User is logged in and has a privilege level equal or higher than 'Can Comment'.
steps: User selects a particular block of the page.
User writes a textual comment.
Alternatively, user may mention other persons or groups or pages.

testcases.name: Valid Comment
testcases.description: Verify that the comment is successfully posted when all parameters are correct.

expected.outcome: Comment posted and mentioned persons and groups notified successfully

testcases.name: Self Mentioning
testcases.description: Verify that the comment is successfully posted without sending notification when a user mentions himself/herself.

expected.outcome: Comment posted successfully but no one is notified.

testcases.name: Empty Text and Mention
testcases.description: Verify that the comment is rejected if no text or mention is there.

testcases.name: Only Mentioning without Text
testcases.description: Verify that the comment is posted even if it does not have a text but mentions some users/groups.

expected.outcome: Comment posted and mentioned persons and groups notified successfully

usecase.name: Suggest Edits to Content
usecase.scenario: A user suggests edit to a block of a page content and the owner accepts or rejects the proposed change.
steps: User selects a particular block of the page.
User writes a textual comment.
Alternatively, user may mention other persons or groups or pages.

testcases.name: Acceptance by Owner
testcases.description: Verify that the edit is properly reflected on the content when the owner approves the change.

expected.outcome: Previous content replaced by suggested new content.

testcases.name: Rejection by Owner
testcases.description: Verify that the edit is discarded when the owner rejects the change.
